comments:
Reported by Alan Ernhart: After recording, exited the browser and waited up to 
10 seconds before clicking the Stop Recording button on Recorder Control.
Test generation dialog doesn't appear; there's no sign that anything is 
happening.

Wait ~10 seconds and click the button again. Again nothing happens, but in the 
terminal window you started eclipse on, the traceback shown below is displayed.

This exception does not appear in the .metadata/.log.
Exiting and removing the workspace and starting over... it works as it should, 
so it's a random thing.

I've not had a chance yet to study this, e.g. is it a drag vs. a click on the 
button or what?

proxy recorder listening to port1080
====>Exiting Proxy normally

I have tried to reproduce this 25 times in TPTP 4.1 and have not seen this 
error.  The improvements made the the execution harness  and the RAC 
apparently have cleared up this problem.  I used to see this in Hyades 3.3.
